title: Texas floods: search continues with dozens dead and missing

title: Martin Zubimendi signs for Arsenal
description: The Spanish international arrives from Real Sociedad on a long-term contract, and will wear the number 36 shirt
content:
We’re delighted to announce that Spain international Martin Zubimendi has joined us on a long-term contract.

title: Scrapping two-child benefit cap may be harder after welfare U-turn, minister says
description: Bridget Phillipson stresses that changes to welfare bill after threatened rebellion by backbench MPs have come at a cost
content:
Downing Street’s U-turn on changes to welfare last week will make it harder to implement other policies such as potentially scrapping the two-child benefit cap, Bridget Phillipson has said.

title: ‘We’ve made progress’: environment secretary is upbeat despite Labour’s struggles
description: Steve Reed says changes to living standards are happening and will make a big difference to trust in government
content:
It was probably easier for Steve Reed to feel more cheerful about Labour’s most torrid week in government while sitting on bales of hay in the blazing sunshine about 40 miles from Westminster.
